summary: A simple Bodyslide Preset I made. Wide range of breast sizes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][color=#e69138][size=3]Several people asked me if I could upload my Bodyslide preset that I'm using in my videos. So here it is.[/size][/color][/font]

[img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/160110/v6qpyag8.jpg[/img]

As you can see the breasts, thighs and the butt are getting bigger from weight 0 to 100. The body in the picture is CBBE with HDT. You can try to use other bodies but it will look different.

I hope you like the body and feel free to upload screenshots.
Â 
The file contains the Bodyslide preset and the body.
[font=Tahoma]It's the first time I upload a file here on nexus[/font][font=Tahoma]mods, so if it doesn't work let me know.


[color=#e69138][size=3]Required Mods:[/size][/color][size=3]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]"Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-"[/url] by Caliente[/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]"BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio"[/url] by Caliente[/size]


[color=#e69138]Mods I used for the screenshots:[/color]
[/size][url=http://gomaperopero.tumblr.com/post/110079862020/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%AD%E3%83%AF%E3%83%BCmod-gomaperofollower-v15-update-unp-ver][/url][font=Tahoma][size=3][size=2][url=http://gomaperopero.tumblr.com/post/110079862020/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%AD%E3%83%AF%E3%83%BCmod-gomaperofollower-v15-update-unp-ver]''GomaPero Follower''[/url] by GomaPero[/size][/size][/font][url=http://gomaperopero.tumblr.com/post/110079862020/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%AD%E3%83%AF%E3%83%BCmod-gomaperofollower-v15-update-unp-ver]
[/url][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=3][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]''Fair Skin Textures''[/url] by [/size][/size][/font]HHaleyy
[font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][font=Tahoma][size=3][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18941/?]''Opethfeldt ENB''[/url] by [/size][/size][/font]opethfeldt[/font][/font]
